price: Ҳамда Аллоҳнинг изни ила У Зотга даъват этувчи ва нурли чироқ қилиб.
arabic: وَدَاعِيًا إِلَى ٱللَّهِ بِإِذۡنِهِۦ وَسِرَاجٗا مُّنِيرٗا

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wadāʿiyan ilā al-lahi bi-idh'nihi wasirājan munīran
